description: Caroline is a longtime Pret ambassador with whom we have had the pleasure of working to develop new product, improve on existing styles, and get expert feedback on the direction of the brand. This unique colorway is inspired by Caroline’s approach to the mountains and mixing modern, retro, and timeless design to create something new.<br><br>Lyric X2 delivers performance, style, safety, and a perfect fit with MIPS® technology and direct Level 1 ventilation. Pret's exclusive HALEO antimicrobial foam along with IONIC+® fabric keeps you fresh. The Ultra lightweight ACT combines In Mold multi shell construction with overlapping PC shells for durability and protection. Fidlock magnetic buckles for quick and easy connection. The Lyric X2 is audio ready featuring detachable Covert Ear Covers.
name: Lyric X2 CG (Caroline Gleich) Signature Helmet - Womens
